channel.title: Server Offline
channel.description:
Ok so this morning I made a RS server in about 4H and I followed a STEP BY STEP tutorial. Eeverything is working fine BUT 1 thing. when i launche the server it says the following
Starting WeedScape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594
I think that its the error, I think I did the portforwarding part as I was supposed to. If you need I could post the picture of the portforwarding screen.

item.title: Server Offline
item.dc:creator: @mitchtheblonde mitchtheblonde
item.description:
@mitchtheblonde wrote:

no 127.0.0.1 is your localhost IP. Your going to need to port forward your router. If you don’t know how to do this, i can help you. But, to post it on the website, your going to need your external IP. To find that, you can go to whatismyip.com. you then take that IP and use it for your no-ip address.

Read full topic

item.title: Server Offline
item.dc:creator: @v_cove_v v cove v
item.description:
@v_cove_v wrote:

127.0.0.1 is my ip lol

Read full topic

item.title: Server Offline
item.dc:creator: @Rockin Rockin
item.description:
@Rockin wrote:

[quote=“P.o.w.e.r, post:1, topic:265718”]Ok so this morning I made a RS server in about 4H and I followed a STEP BY STEP tutorial.
Eeverything is working fine BUT 1 thing. when i launche the server it says the following

Starting WeedScape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594

I think that its the error, I think I did the portforwarding part as I was supposed to. If you need I could post the picture of the portforwarding screen.[/quote]

4 hours to make a server…?

Ok, besides that point. Go to Start->Run->Type in cmd in run->Once cmd opens up type in ipconfig->You should see “Default Gateway”, use that IP and no-ip it

Read full topic

item.title: Server Offline
item.dc:creator: @Pure_Destiny Pure Destiny
item.description:
@Pure_Destiny wrote:

[quote=“warlock 999, post:8, topic:265718”][quote author=Pure Destiny link=topic=350813.msg2694307#msg2694307 date=1236155681]

try connecting to 127.0.0.1
[/quote]Using a different IP won’t help as it’s already logged in.

And P.o.w.e.r, are you sure you did it perfectly, I mean you said everything went perfect, but how do you know? It’s not working.

Connecting to 127.0.0.1 is localhost which you don’t need to portfoward to get on your server…[/quote]Duh, when did I say that is not true?

Read full topic

item.title: Server Offline
item.dc:creator: @P.o.w.e.r P.o.w.e.r
item.description:
@P.o.w.e.r wrote:

I AM able to connect on my server but when I go to try and post my server IP on the website of moparscape server list. It tells me that the server ip i entered is offline…when i am connected on it with all the configuration thats in my folders. I think I did it right because I followed a tutorial step by step and i even redid the tutorial 3 times. So YES I am pretty sure thats I did everything right. I will try and accesse my portforwarding section in the router, it probably IS the problem.

Read full topic

item.title: Server Offline
item.dc:creator: @thugscape thugscape
item.description:
@thugscape wrote:

Step. 1. Download utorrent.
Step. 2. run utorrent.
step. 3. Do options, prefrences.
Step. 3. Click connection
Step. 4. Run your server.
Step. 5. Change the port to 43594 click apply. Then type your ip into the client. Silab prefibly.
If you have trouble. Pm me. I will help you more.

Read full topic
